author: Shreya Garg
content: I am 27-year-old Bengaluru resident. I got married in 2019 to the girl I was madly in love with. We were both from Bihar. I met her at a mutual friend’s birthday party in 2017 when we were both in college. From the moment I laid eyes on her, I was captivated by her beauty. We hit it off instantly.
title: Why I cheated: My wife turned into a control freak

author: Devika Kapoor
content: Aokigahara is a beautiful forest on Japan's Honshu island. Due to the unique features of its lava rocks, the dense forest gives a sense of solitude. The forest is also known as Suicide Forest. If you find the nickname a bit creepy, it's okay. In this article, we will explain how it has earned that tag.
title: Do you know which forest is known as Suicide Forest?

author: Shreya Garg
content: A team of 10 women had scaled the height of Mt Everest and even bagged two Limca Book Of Records in a day in 2016. The two women from the team share the challenges they had to face and their learnings from the expedition. On Women's day, they open up on how the experience made them will empowered.
title: Everesters Reminisce Their Journey Of Grit And Determination

author: Shreya Garg
content: Bollywood actors and sisters Karisma Kapoor and Kareena Kapoor Khan are one of the fashionable and loved duos. The sisters share a great bond with each other and have stood by each other through thick and thin. Besides, the two sisters are always rooting for each other and spend a lot of time together vacationing around the world.
title: Karisma Kapoor and Kareena Kapoor are sibling goals; Here’s why

author: Devika Kapoor
content: The origin of paneer in India has been attributed to Afghan and Iranian rulers. In Ancient India, during the time of Aryan civilisation, the acidulation of milk was forbidden, and no sour milk cheese was mentioned in the texts of that time or before, including the Vedas. Read on further to know more about it.
title: How India got to know about paneer? Read to find out

author: Raksha
content: At 17, Ritu faced an acid attack, enduring pain and betrayal. After 2.5 years of legal battles, she embraced a new reality, empowered by family and Chhanv Foundation. Defying societal norms, she walked runways, worked with Deepika Padukone, and found love. Now marrying, Ritu's story is a journey of resilience, self-acceptance, inspiring survivors to rewrite their narratives.
title: Acid attack survivor gets married

author: Raksha
content: A post by the storytelling platform Humans of Bombay uncovers the story of Vishwadeep, a man from Bangalore who's been diagnosed with Schizophrenia. Here, he reveals how he was unable to comprehend what was happening to him and Schizophrenia made him suspicious of everything and everyone around him. With time, he learnt to accept and understand his ailment with help.
title: Bangalore man diagnosed with Schizophrenia

author: Bhana Neur
content: Radhika Merchant is soon to be married to Anant Ambani. To commemorate their impending union, the couple's families organised an extravagant three-day pre-wedding celebration. Let's delve into the attire choices of the bride-to-be during the festivities. The couple is slated to tie the knot in July this year.
title: Watch: significance of Radhika Merchant's outfits at pre-wedding

author: Roshan Gupta
content: Golden Willows at Hiranandani Fortune City, Panvel, has announced balcony homes from 2-4 BHK, that promise you from serene river views to majestic hillscapes and from forest panoramas to vibrant gardens. It's a mesmerizing paradise with 70+ amenities and Hiranandani’s biggest-ever clubhouse– Club Royale, spread across 90,000 sq. ft, offering leisure that’s ahead of its time, the brand said.
title: Hills, river, forest or garden views, the choice is yours: Hiranandani

author: Deepika Bhatt
content: India's filter coffee has ranked second in the list of the best rated coffees in the world released by TasteAtlas. The list is topped by Cuban espresso. Espresso freddo (Greece) ranked third, followed by freddo cappuccino (Greece), cappuccino (Italy), Turkish coffee (Turkey), ristretto (Italy) and frappe (Greece). Eiskaffee (Germany) and Vietnamese iced coffee (Vietnam) are also in the list.
title: India's filter coffee ranks 2nd in list of best coffees in the world
